group_1.textLeft: Thank you, committee members!

group_1.textRight: You're welcome!
Okay, we'll leave the rest to you.

group_1.textLeft: Any other requests for help...
...Nope, looks like we're all done...!

group_1.textRight: Good work!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for helping me today, Manaka.
Thanks to you, we were able to solve all@the trouble.

group_1.textRight: Aren't you exaggerating? You're the one who@did all the hard work.

group_1.textLeft: That's not...true......

group_1.textRight: ...You look exhausted.
Well, why don't you come by my place?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: I'll treat you to some rice omelets!

group_1.textLeft: Let's go!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ahhhh, that was delicious!@It brought me back to life!

group_1.textLeft: As usual, you eat in a way that's pleasant@to watch.
It makes me feel like it was worth all the@effort.

group_1.textRight: Ehehe...please make me another one!

group_1.textLeft: Coming right up!
It was a really busy day, wasn't it...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.narration: This is a warning...@Call off the school festival...@If you don't cancel the festival...@A series of troubles will follow, and@the consequences will be terrible.

group_1.textRight: It started with a threatening letter...

group_1.narration: "Trouble occurred in Manaka's class and@Mayu-senpai's class, where they received@different items than what they meant to order...@It's unknown how the culprit rewrote the order forms@for both the middle school and high school classes..."
"And the mushrooms in Kanoko-senpai's class@that multiplied over the whole classroom overnight...@Come to think of it, we still don't know how@the culprit pulled that one off either..."

group_1.textRight: Oh, by the way, what about the@invisible person...?

group_1.textLeft: The rumor about how no one was@caught on camera?
Isn't it more realistic to assume it was just@someone with inside knowledge of the school?

group_1.textRight: Hmmm, I guess you're right.
Anyway...

group_1.narration: "The fire detector malfunction that occurred in@the classroom used by Ria-senpai's class and@Sana's class, was caused by an outdated detector."
"The incident that Tsukuyo-senpai reported,@where the representatives fought over Sayuki-senpai,@was caused by long-standing rivalry between@the sports clubs and culture clubs."

group_1.textRight: In the end, just how was it possible for the@culprit to make those problems happen?

group_1.textLeft: ...Maybe the culprit is tech-savvy and knows@a lot about psychology?

group_1.textRight: If it's true what Asuka-senpai said about there@being more than one culprit...
Does this mean the work was divided up@among professionals...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know if it's more than one culprit,@but it's possible...

group_1.textRight: I still don't understand what the culprit's true@intentions are...

group_1.narration: "I thought they wanted to cancel the school festival,@but the arch, the face of the school festival, was@only slightly damaged at the base..."
"The barbecue party at the end of the festival,@the closing event, only had the skewers ruined,@but it would have been much more difficult to fix@if it had been the ingredients..."

group_1.textRight: It's clear that they want to interfere, but@it seems like they're holding back.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe they weren't able to do any more than@that...or they're actually just a coward.

group_1.textRight: Coward?

group_1.textLeft: They want to interfere, but they're afraid to@do anything more serious.

group_1.textRight: I see...!

group_1.textLeft: Is there anything else that might give us a clue?

group_1.textRight: ...Let me think...
[chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ahh! Oh no!
I have to get home soon, or I'll miss dinner!

group_1.textLeft: What...are you still hungry?

group_1.textRight: Your rice omelet is a treat! Dinner is dinner!
See you tomorrow! Thanks for the food!

group_1.textCenter: I have to change my clothes and take a bath...
...Hm? Is there something in my pocket...?
Ohh, seeds! I forgot about these...!

group_1.textRight: Let's see, there are small seeds...
Medium seeds...
And large seeds...

group_1.textCenter: ...I can feel the same magic...from all of them...

group_1.narration: Then, the culprit is...a Magical Girl?!
